sources.title: 1943 Gabriele Dambrone ( Gusti Huber, Eugen Klöpfer, Theodor Loos, Fritz Kampers)
sources.description: Film aus dem deutschen dritten Reich von 1943. Gabriele Dambrone. u.a mit Gusti Huber und Eugen Klöpfer

metadata.Plot: Gabi is devastated when her fiance leaves her for another woman. She finds solace with the artist Paul who takes her to a wonderful winter resort in the Alpes. What Gabi doesn't know: Paul has a wife and two children.
metadata.Writer: Richard Billinger, Per Schwenzen, Hans Steinhoff
metadata.Actors: Gusti Huber, Siegfried Breuer, Christl Mardayn
